import{useState,useCallback}from'react';import{Icon}from'../../theme/daisyui';import*as D from'../../data';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CreateListForm=_ref=>{let{onCreateList}=_ref;const[value,setValue]=useState(D.randomTitleText());const onChange=useCallback(e=>{setValue(()=>e.target.value);},[]);const addList=useCallback(()=>{onCreateList(D.randomUUID(),value);setValue(()=>D.randomTitleText());},[value,onCreateList]);// prettier-ignore
